name: Skydiving Simulator VR
description: Skydiving Simulator VR is a Virtual Reality parachuting experience in 4 different locations: Grassplains, Future City, Tropical Islands, and Snow Mountain. Perfect for casual gamers and sports seekers. Support for both HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 700 MB available space
